zenkai_warrior_strike.name: Warrior Strike
zenkai_warrior_strike.description: A powerful strike channeling warrior spirit. 3x STR damage.

zenkai_berserker_rage.name: Berserker Rage
zenkai_berserker_rage.description: An all-out attack fueled by rage. 4x STR damage, but take 2x damage next round.

zenkai_final_rush.name: Final Rush
zenkai_final_rush.description: A desperate final attack. 5x STR damage, consumes 30% current HP. 3 round cooldown.

vitalis_healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
vitalis_healing_touch.description: Channel mystical energy to heal wounds. Restores 30% max HP.

vitalis_magic_burst.name: Magic Burst
vitalis_magic_burst.description: A burst of raw magic energy. 2.5x INT damage, ignores VIT.

vitalis_time_freeze.name: Time Freeze
vitalis_time_freeze.description: Freeze time briefly. Enemy skips their next attack. 4 round cooldown.

terran_precision_shot.name: Precision Shot
terran_precision_shot.description: A calculated strike combining strength and agility. 2x (STR + DEX) damage.

terran_energy_shield.name: Energy Shield
terran_energy_shield.description: Deploy an energy barrier. Reduces incoming damage by 50% this round.

terran_orbital_strike.name: Orbital Strike
terran_orbital_strike.description: Call down an orbital bombardment. 4x STR damage, guaranteed hit. 3 round cooldown.

glacial_death_beam.name: Death Beam
glacial_death_beam.description: A piercing energy beam. 3x STR damage, ignores 50% of enemy VIT.

glacial_golden_barrage.name: Golden Barrage
glacial_golden_barrage.description: Unleash devastating power in golden form. 6x STR damage. Requires Golden Form transformation. 5 round cooldown.

power_up.name: Power Up
power_up.description: Focus your energy. Increase STR by 20% for 3 rounds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Try to evade the next attack. 50% chance to avoid damage.

meditation.name: Meditation
meditation.description: Focus and recover. Restore 20% HP, but skip your attack.
